title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 973.4 - Notification of interest in acquisition by others
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 973.4 - Notification of interest in acquisition by others

State Regulations

Any appropriate transportation authority and State and
local governmental agency shall indicate its interest in exercising the
preferential right of acquisition to the Director, Project Development Bureau, New York State Department of Transportation, Building 4, State Campus, Albany, New York 12232, by the date stipulated in the notification. Failure of an
agency or transportation authority to reply by this stipulated date shall be
interpreted as indicating that the agency or authority does not wish to
exercise the preferential right. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
973.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
